pkgmetadata.longdescription: Access to Ethereum-Based Blockchains Through Geth Nodes // Full access to the Geth command line interface for running full Ethereum nodes. With gethr it is possible to carry out different tasks such as mine ether, transfer funds, create contacts, explore block history, etc. The package also provides access to all the available APIs. The officially exposed by Ethereum blockchains (eth, shh, web3, net) and some provided directly by Geth (admin, debug, miner, personal, txpool). For more details on Ethereum, access the project website https://www.ethereum.org/. For more details on the Geth client, access the project website https://github.com/ethereum/go- ethereum/wiki/geth/.
